attributes.action: Introduce legislation to ensure that prison sentences are served in full with no remission
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It does seem to be quite silly to sentence an offender to 14 years in prison for a particular heinous crime and only 7 years is actually served.

rejection.details: Similar petitions already exist http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/sentences/ http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/justice/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
